disabled.resolution: The workspace is not available at this resolution
disabled.visible: The layer is not loaded. Try to set the layer visibility.

toastPanel.title: Entities found on the map
toastPanel.listButton: Return to the list of entities
toastPanel.zoomOnFeatureTooltip: Zoom on selected feature ( shortcut = z )
toastPanel.zoomOnFeatureTooltipOutOfView: The feature is out of view. Zoom on selected feature ( shortcut = z )
toastPanel.zoomOnFeaturesTooltip: Zoom on all the selected features

noEntityStore: No tables available for this dataset

welcomeWindow.html:
Welcome to {{title}, the Qu√©bec goverment mapping application

Version {{version}}, build on {{releaseDate}}

oldBrowser.title: Too old browser
oldBrowser.message: IGO2 does not fully support your browser. Please update it or use a different one.

global.title: Interactive tour
global.menu-button: Click on the menu button to open and close the main menu.
global.search-bar: Find an address, a GPS point, a layer, etc.
global.search-settings: Allows you to configure: the type of result, the number of desired results, etc.
global.toolbox: On selection of the tool, the application switches inside and displays its content.
global.search-tool: Search results tool allow to display the results that come from the search bar input.
global.context: A context is a predefined map made up of several layers grouped together according to a theme.
global.map-tool: All layers are display in this tool. Some manipulations can also be done on these.
global.spatial-filter: Spatial filter allow to extract entities by predefined or drawn zone.
global.measurer-tool: For distance, perimeter and ground area calculation.
global.draw-tool: drawing points, lines, polygons and circles on the map.
global.directions-tool: Allow route creation based on departure, arrival and intermediate stop.
global.catalog-tool: Catalogs contain all the available layers in IGO. These are classified by general topic (catalog) and sub-categories.
global.import-export: Import-export tool allow layers importation and exportation.
global.print-tool: Print the active map according to certain format.
global.ogc-tool: The data filter allows to filter WMS and WFS data based on various comparison operators (Equal, different...) or with a spatial operator (intersect, within...). Applies only to certain layers where the filter can be applied and which are present in the map
global.time-tool: The temporal filter allows to delimit a period of time which will filter the layer and display only the results which correspond to the defined period of time. Applies only to certain layers where the filter can be applied and which are present in the map
global.share-map: Share a map by his URL link
global.tool-choose: When we select a tool from the toolbox...
global.home-button: This button allow to get back to main menu
global.geolocate: To zoom the map to your location.
global.user-button: To authenticate you or to disconnect and stay anonymous.

timeFilter.title: TIME FILTER
timeFilter.start: The temporal filter allows to delimit a period of time which will filter the layer and display only the results which correspond to the defined period of time
timeFilter.end: Applies only to certain layers where the filter can be applied and which are present in the map

measurer.title: MEASURER
measurer.start: Guided tour of the measuring tool
measurer.options: Here's all the measure options possibilities
measurer.toggle-2: Activate and deactivate to allow drawing on the map
measurer.toggle-3: Activate and deactivate to allow measure display on the map
measurer.toggle-4: Automatic units allow to use and calculate with predefined measure units
measurer.map: To use this tool, one click allow to start drawing and two clicks allow to finish it
measurer.map-2: The same way as distance, one click allow to start drawing and two clicks allow to finish it
measurer.measure-field: Measure result will appear in this field
measurer.measure-unit: It is also possible to modify the result's measure unit
measurer.area-click: Now, let's select the area mode
measurer.perimeter: In area mode, distance field becomes perimeter filed
measurer.area-field: Area result will appear in this field
measurer.area-unit: Il It is also possible to modify the result's measure unit
measurer.results: All results will appear in this table
measurer.results-buttons: These buttons allow to calculate and to delete some measures
measurer.check-measure: To activate table's buttons, select one or more results
measurer.active-results-buttons: If so measure are selected, button's are now active!

spatial-filter.title: SPATIAL FILTER
spatial-filter.start: The spatial filter allow to select certain features that match with a specified area. Results are added to the map
spatial-filter.predefined: A predefined zone is a surface entity that already exists like a municipality or a RCM
spatial-filter.drawing: Drawing tab allow to draw directly the zone on the map
spatial-filter.search-by: If predefined zone is selected, the type's going to be chosen here
spatial-filter.zone: The choice for the zone is made here
spatial-filter.results-type: The spatial selection can be done by address or by thematics layer
spatial-filter.address: Address research allow to search all the addresses inside the zone
spatial-filter.warning-address: Be careful, depending on the zone size, result can be excessively huge!
spatial-filter.thematics: Thematics are a set of layers classfied by global theme. We can then search schools, hospitals, hydrographics entities.
spatial-filter.thematics-choose: We can then search schools, hospitals, hydrography entities etc.
spatial-filter.initialize: Once one or multiple parameters are selected, it is possible do reset them anytime
spatial-filter.drawing-type: It is possible to choose to draw a polygon or a circle
spatial-filter.activate-drawing: First option allow to enable or not the action of drawing on the map
spatial-filter.freehand-drawing: Second option allow to enable the freehand drawing (left click down and up to finish the drawing).
spatial-filter.circle-radius: Here, we can establish the size of the circle based on his radius
spatial-filter.circle-freehand: If we activate freehand drawing option, radius isn't use anymore
spatial-filter.drawing-map: To draw in standard mode, one click allow to start the drawing and two clicks allow to finish it
spatial-filter.clear-drawing: Once the drawing is finish, it is always possible to delete it from the map
spatial-filter.thematics-choose-2: Choose thematics to search if you haven't yet
spatial-filter.launch: Once parameters are selected, the spatial selection can be launch
spatial-filter.results-table: Results will appear in this table
spatial-filter.clear-results: Results can be deleted from the map anytime with this button
spatial-filter.export: It is also possible to export the result using the export tool

context.title: CONTEXTS
context.start: Guided tour of the context tool
context.description: A context is a predefined map made up of several layers grouped together according to a theme.
context.options: A context can also be cloned, masked and, based on the permissions that has been set, edited and shared.
context.select: Active context appears highlighted. To switch the active context, click on the context you want to display. The sidenav will then toggle on the map tool.
context.favorite: To bookmark a context and thereby be active at login.
context.save-context: Click here to save active context.
context.context-options: To see which actions can be done on this context, click on this button.
context.context-options-opened: Possible actions vary depending on the context
context.context-clone: This button enable to clone this context and thereby personalize yours from this one.
context.context-edit: This button is used to change the context's name and to share his id.
context.context-hide: This button allows to hide the context. It won't be display by default.
context.context-delete: Click here to delete the context.
context.filter: Type text here to filter the list by name
context.alpha: Click to sort alphabetically. Initially, contexts list is sort by creation date.
context.add-context: To create an empty context or from map's layers.
context.users-filter: Click to see user's profil filter options
context.users-filter-menu: Check associated context profil that you want to be display on the list.
context.users-filter-active: For example, it is possible to display or not self shared contexts.
context.users-filter-hide: It is also possible to display hide contexts.

map-tool.title: MAP
map-tool.start: Guided tour of the map's tool
map-tool.layer-list: Map's tool allow to display the list of layers on the active map.
map-tool.legend-list: Map's tool can also be used to present layer's legend list. We'll come back to this later.
map-tool.layer-item: A layer contains a set of element of the same type.
map-tool.layer-item-click: One clic on the layer's title allows to show and hide layer's legend.
map-tool.eye-button: On clic on the eye allow to show and hide the layer. A grey eye indicate a non visible layer at the active scale. Zoom in or out to see the layer.
map-tool.actions-button: A click here display possible actions that can be done on the layer.
map-tool.layer-actions-group: Layer's toolbar is gonna be accessible here.
map-tool.workspace-button: This button allows the opening of the tabular view (results table).
map-tool.export-button: Click here to export the layer through IGO's export tool.
map-tool.ogc-button: OGC filter is an attribute filter that allow to refine layer's visual in relation with certain attributes.
map-tool.time-button: Time filter can be used to bring out layer's elements listed within a certain time interval.
map-tool.metadata-button: Click here to access layer's metadata.
map-tool.opacity-button: Layer's opacity can be modified from this button.
map-tool.up-button: Allow to raise the layer's rank of appearance by one on the active map. It is also going to raise in the layer's list.
map-tool.down-button: Allow to lower the layer's rank of appearance by one on the active map. It is also going to lower in the layer's list
map-tool.delete-button: Click on this button to delete the layer from the active map.
map-tool.name-filter: Enter text here to filter the layer's list y name.
map-tool.alpha: Click to sort the list alphabetically. By default, layers are sorted by appearence order. Take notice that the sorting WON'T affect the appearance order on the map.
map-tool.eye-filter: Click to keep only the visible layers at active scale.
map-tool.selection-mode: With a click here, we toggle the multiple selection mode.
map-tool.check-layer: It is now possible to perform actions simultaneously on multiple layers by selecting many of them.
map-tool.layer-actions-group-selection: Toolbar activate as soon as one layer is selected. Take notice that only layer's commons actions are accessible.
map-tool.select-all: This button allow to select or deselect all layers of the list.
map-tool.legend-tab-description: This tab can be used to display all layer's legend. By default, only visible layers at active scale will have their legend displayed.
map-tool.legend-tab-all: Allow to also display non visible layer's legend at active scale.

pwa.new-version: Do you want to reload the app?
pwa.data-download-start: Downloading data for offline use. Please don't leave the application.

messages.title: Title from a translation
messages.message:
Message from a translation -
Message at the context level
Open the layer 'MSP Tel. Urgence' to see messages at the layer level.
